CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the warm-up task to MOT . INV leaves the room
CHI looks at the picture book
CHI points to the pictures on the page individually
CHI looks up from the book at something in front of her
CHI reaches for the football on the floor in front of her
MOT reaches for a toy on the floor
<aft> MOT picks up a toy duck and squeezes it
MOT and CHI reach for the same toy football . MOT picks up another toy instead
CHI holds the football while looking at MOT squeeze the duck . <aft> CHI looks down at ball in her hands
MOT holds out the rubber duck and squeezes it as she looks over at CHI
CHI looks around on the floor then down at the ball in her hands
MOT puts down the toy duck then reaches for the truck
CHI looks at MOT then up and around the room
MOT moves the truck around on the floor then stops
<aft> MOT looks at CHI then up in the direction CHI was looking
CHI moves up onto her knees reaching for the jack+in+the+box then looks up in the direction MOT points
CHI sits back down then reaches for the jack+in+the+box again
<bef> MOT reaches over and moves the jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
CHI turns the handle on the jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI turns to look at something on the floor beside her
CHI points to the picture in the book
MOT bends down closer to CHI then glances over at CHI
CHI leans back as she looks down at the book
<$=1> MOT points to the picture and looks at CHI
CHI reaches down and points to a picture
CHI looks around on the floor while touching the book
MOT reaches down for the book then looks over at the chair across the room
MOT gets up on one knee as she pulls the panda chair over
MOT glances over at CHI then at the chair
CHI looks over at the chair then down at the book
CHI turns towards MOT then stands up
CHI points up to the wall while looking at MOT
MOT looks up where CHI pointed as she nods her head in agreement . <aft> MOT glances at CHI then up at the wall
MOT refers to a picture that is not in camera range
CHI holds onto the chair as she turns and looks up . CHI turns around and looks down at the chair
MOT continues to look up then looks over at CHI
CHI turns in the chair so her back is to MOT as she points to the mirror on the wall
CHI turns in the chair so she faces the camera directly
CHI turns around in the chair and sits in it then looks over at MOT
MOT sits down folding her knees in front of her as she looks over at CHI
CHI looks around while sitting in the chair . <aft> CHI looks down
CHI accidentally kicks the jack+in+the+box on the floor in front of her then rests her foot on it
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box out of the way
CHI gets down off of the chair
<aft> CHI bends down then picks up the football
MOT throws the ball to CHI
MOT catches the ball as it slips through CHI hands then places the ball in CHI hands firmly
CHI holds the ball as she looks across the room at something
MOT moves to the other side of the room then holds out her hands
CHI tosses the ball to MOT
CHI falls to the floor then sits down beside MOT
CHI reaches for a toy on the floor in front of her then CHI glances back and forth between the toy in her hands and the car MOT holds
<bef> MOT reaches down for the toy car in front of her then holds it up and turns it over
MOT reads the inscription on the bottom of the car
MOT rolls the car back and forth
MOT rolls the car then lets go of it
MOT moves so she is sitting opposite CHI
CHI looks behind her at something then turns around and looks across the room
CHI bangs the duck on the floor
MOT moves some toys around on the floor then bounces the football on the floor in front of CHI
CHI reaches for the football then looks over at the book in MOT hands
CHI tosses the football in the air and lets it drop to the floor
MOT reaches down for the book on the floor beside her then opens it
MOT looks down at the book as she turns its pages
MOT turns the book so it faces CHI
<bef> CHI reaches over then picks up the toy car and looks at it
CHI rolls the car on the rug
CHI falls forward as she rolls the car too far ahead of herself on the rug
MOT moves the jack+in+the+box out of CHI way
MOT refers to CHI falling forward
<$=1> MOT looks across the room and points
CHI sits down then looks down reaches down for the duck on the floor in front of her
CHI picks up the duck and squeezes it
MOT looks at CHI and nods her head yes
CHI looks up in the direction of MOT then looks across the room
CHI leans forward on one knee as she reaches for the jack+in+the+box . CHI stands then looks up at something
CHI looks around as she holds onto the duck
CHI turns to look at MOT then turns and looks up
CHI turns around then looks behind MOT while holding the duck
CHI walks past MOT then reaches for the arm of the chair by the table . CHI looks up
CHI drops the duck to the floor
<aft> MOT leans forward then reaches for the chair
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI as she holds the chair in place
CHI turns in the chair so she is in a sitting position . CHI looks straight ahead
CHI head is visible to the camera
CHI looks at the camera then turns and gets out of the chair looking in MOT direction
MOT looks at CHI and nods her head no
CHI is out of camera range
MOT sits in full view of the camera as CHI is somewhere behind the scenes
MOT leans forward on her knees and looks over the table
MOT looks at what CHI is doing out of camera range
the camera moves so CHI is now visible behind the table
MOT is out of camera range
CHI holds the toy she found then looks around
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
MOT leans back again out of camera range
CHI walks around the table until she stands next to MOT . <aft> CHI looks over at the camera
the camera moves so both MOT and CHI are visible
CHI looks at MOT then at camera
INV explains small scale activity to MOT then leaves the room
INV explains forbidden object to MOT
CHI sits at the table playing with a necklace
MOT reaches for the necklace then removes her hand
MOT is seated next to CHI and visible from the waist down
INV puts the forbidden object on the table
<$=1> MOT leans forward and looks over at CHI
CHI stares at the object while holding on to the necklace
MOT looks at CHI then up at the object
MOT shakes her head no as she looks at CHI
CHI looks down at the necklace in her hands
<aft> CHI puts the necklace on the table then picks it up again
INV starts to put away the object
CHI reaches out on the table with the necklace
CHI puts the necklace on the table
INV places her hand on the necklace as she puts the object in the drawer
MOT looks at CHI then at object as it is placed in the drawer
CHI looks in the direction of object as it is put away
INV puts the object away and closes the drawer
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes as she walks to the door
CHI watches the adults then gets up out of her chair and walks towards MOT
MOT holds the box out in front of CHI
MOT moves the chairs out of the way to make room on the floor
CHI reaches into the box removing the ball
MOT puts the box on the floor off to the side
MOT kneels down on the floor . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
CHI walks towards MOT holding the ball then bends down and puts the ball on the floor
MOT holds out both her arms as she kneels on the floor beside CHI
CHI walks over to the chair then glances in MOT direction
<$=1> MOT holds the ball as she looks over at CHI
CHI pulls the panda chair into the middle of the room
MOT leans forward while reaching for the chair
MOT pushes the chair back towards the wall
CHI walks towards the chair as she nods her head in agreement . <aft> CHI leans against the chair then looks in MOT direction
<$=1> MOT leans back as she holds the ball in front of her
CHI runs towards MOT with outstretched arms . <aft> CHI catches ball
<bef> MOT throws the ball to CHI
MOT helps CHI hold on to the ball
CHI walks away from MOT holding the ball
CHI puts the ball into the box then picks up the box
CHI walks around holding the box then kneels down in front of MOT placing the box on the floor between them
<$=1> MOT holds out her arms as she looks at CHI
CHI loses her balance and falls off to one side as she reaches into the box
MOT reaches down and hold on to the box
CHI sits upright then takes the ball out of the box
<aft> CHI looks across the room towards the camera as she holds the ball
MOT puts the box behind her
MOT holds out her arms as she looks down at CHI
CHI throws the ball into the air
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI looks down then reaches for the ball as it approaches her
CHI stops the ball from rolling then pushes it away from her
MOT reaches for the ball as it rolls across the floor
MOT moves to get the ball
MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI rolls the ball to MOT
CHI looks across the room towards the door
MOT rolls the ball back towards CHI
MOT rolls the ball into the corner of the room
CHI watches as the ball rolls past her
MOT points to the ball as she moves from a kneeling position to a sitting position on the floor
<bef> CHI looks towards MOT then looks over her shoulder in the direction of the ball . CHI turns her back on MOT and reaches for the ball
MOT leans over for the ball
MOT grips the ball in one hand on the floor
CHI stands up with her back to MOT . CHI holds on to the wastebasket and looks down into it
CHI turns around then walks towards MOT
<bef> CHI reaches down for the ball . <aft> CHI walks over behind MOT while holding the ball
CHI drops the ball into the box
CHI picks up the box then places it on the floor in front of MOT
CHI walks past MOT as she looks around the room then walks back in front of MOT
MOT points to the area behind her as she watches CHI
<$=1> CHI holds out her arms by her side as she looks across the room
CHI seems to be looking for something specific but does not see it
MOT points to the ball in the box as she stands up
MOT picks up the box and puts it on the desk behind her
CHI taps her hand on the table
CHI looks over in the direction of MOT then walks over towards MOT
MOT sits down on the floor
<aft> MOT opens the box and pulls out the towel
MOT holds the towel up in front of her face
CHI stands facing MOT . <aft> CHI reaches out for the towel in front of MOT face
MOT holds the towel up in front of her face
MOT pulls the towel down then looks at CHI
CHI turns then reaches down to her side
CHI puts the cover on the box that the towel came in
<bef> MOT helps CHI close the box
MOT looks at CHI then holds the towel up in front of her face
CHI walks across the room away from MOT
MOT looks out from behind the towel . MOT watches CHI
CHI climbs onto the panda chair
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT then into the mirror on the wall in front of her
CHI stands on the chair with her back to MOT looking into the mirror
<$=1> MOT holds the towel up in front of her face
<aft> MOT pulls the towel down from in front of her face then looks across the room at CHI
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT
CHI turns around so her back is to MOT then points to the mirror
CHI turns around to look at MOT then points at the mirror
CHI turns and looks into the mirror then pokes the glass
MOT holds out the towel and looks up at CHI
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI starts to climb out of the chair
CHI climbs down from the chair
CHI walks towards MOT reaching for the towel
MOT holds the towel in front of her as she folds it
CHI takes the towel from MOT then bends down to open the box
MOT assists CHI in opening the box
MOT looks down as she holds the top half of the box up in the air
CHI puts the towel in the box then stands up
CHI moves closer to the chair by the desk then looks over her shoulder at MOT
MOT stands up then puts the box away
CHI tries to climb into the chair beside the desk
MOT refers to CHI slipping off the chair
MOT reaches for another box on the desk then reaches down to steady CHI on the chair . <aft> MOT bends down placing the box on the floor
CHI slips off the chair but lands on her feet
<aft> CHI steps back from the chair then watches MOT
MOT moves the half of the box with the paper in it off to one side
CHI looks down at the box
MOT puts the box in front of CHI
CHI bends down reaching into the box
CHI loses her balance and stumbles into the box
<aft> CHI sits down beside the box then reaches into the box for paper
MOT reaches into the box for crayons then slides the box back away from CHI
MOT takes some paper and crayons out of the box and puts them on the floor in front of CHI
CHI leans forward and gets up on one knee . CHI looks down then reaches for a crayon on the floor in front of her . <aft> CHI sits down
MOT watches CHI then looks through the paper in the box
CHI stops coloring then reaches for another crayon
CHI colors with the new crayon
CHI stops coloring then reaches for a new crayon . CHI colors briefly then sits back and looks down
MOT leans down on one elbow
CHI leans forward then gets up on one knee as she looks down
MOT looks at CHI then down at the paper
CHI colors then picks up the piece of paper and places it on the pile of paper outside of the box
CHI leans back then looks down from one pile of paper to the other
CHI reaches down with a crayon
CHI reaches into the box for another piece of paper then places it on the pile outside of the box
<aft> CHI colors then stops and picks up some other crayons
CHI puts down one crayon then picks up another and colors
CHI drops one crayon then picks up another and colors
CHI picks up a couple of crayons off the floor then reaches into the box for more paper
CHI takes all the paper out of the box
MOT taps the box then leans back
CHI sits back then looks in the direction of MOT
MOT taps the inside of the box
CHI looks at the box then down at the crayons in her hand
CHI picks up some crayons off the floor then picks up a piece of paper and puts it in the box
CHI leans forward then lies on the floor with half her body in the box
CHI leans back and gets up on her knees . CHI looks down
MOT reaches for the box cover
MOT gets up on her knees beside CHI
MOT reaches over CHI and gathers up the paper
MOT puts the papers on top of CHI's drawing
CHI sits down then reaches for a crayon
CHI looks up in direction of MOT
MOT moves on her knees past CHI then reaches for something
CHI looks up in the direction of MOT then looks down
MOT brings the next box down
CHI reaches out for the box
CHI leans back then looks down in the direction of the box
MOT puts a crayon in the box
MOT reaches for the crayons in CHI hand
CHI leans forward then drops the crayons into the box
MOT puts the cover on the box
MOT moves box off to the side
CHI reaches for the new box
MOT reaches over for the new box
MOT moves the crayon and paper box onto the desk
CHI takes the book out of the box
MOT sits down on the floor
CHI stands up holding the book then turns and walks over to MOT
MOT reaches for CHI then places her in her lap
CHI points at one page then at the other
MOT looks down over CHI shoulder
CHI gets up out of MOT lap then walks across the room
CHI runs out of camera range
MOT holds the box out to CHI
MOT taps the box then looks at CHI
CHI is out of camera range
MOT looks over at CHI then stands up
